title: Custom Shower Niche Construction (Free Full Length Tutorials) - #shorts #showerniche #freetutorial
description:
Thank you again for the positive feedback. Here's the link to my free full-length tutorials https://homerepairtutor.com/bathroom-remodeling-ideas/

Every week there will be a new video series. This week's theme is custom shower niche construction. I'm trying to make these themes based on feedback from folks like you. So don't hesitate to recommend a theme in the comments.

I believe everyone deserves a clean, safe, and functional bathroom. So that's why I'm posting full tutorials over on homerepairtutor.com - where you can watch tutorials without ads and other distractions.
